msg login error: There was a problem with your login and/or errors exist in your form.
msg validation: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
msg login fail multiple times: You have used 4 out of 5 login attempts. After all 5 have been used, you will be unable to login for 15 minutes.
mgs register success: Registration Confirmed! You can now log in to the site.
msg register error: There're errors in the form. Please correct the errors and try again.
